#include<stdio.h>

int row[100],col[100],matrix[100][100];

int main(){

	int nTestCase = 0,i,j,n;
	scanf("%d",&nTestCase);

	for(int gg=0; gg<nTestCase; gg++){
		scanf("%d",&n);
		
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			row[i] = 0;
			col[i] = 0;
		}

		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			for(j=0; j<n; j++){
				scanf("%d",&matrix[i][j]);
				if(matrix[i][j] == 1){
					row[i]++;
					col[j]++;
				}
			}
		}	

		int r=-1,c=-1;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			if(row[i]%2==1)
				if(r == -1)
					r=i+1;
				else{
					r= -2;
					break;
				}
			

			if(col[i]%2==1)
				if(c == -1)
					c = i+1;
				else{
					c = -2;
					break;
				}
		}

		if(r == -1 && c == -1)
			printf("1\n");
		else if(r == -2 || c == -2)
			printf("0\n");
		else
			printf("(%d,%d)\n",r,c);
		
	}
	
return 0;
}
